Class Monster

java.lang.Object
Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DemonMonster, FireMonster, GlassMonster, GrassMonster, HolyMonster, MedicalMonster, RandomMonster, Team, WaterMonster
public class Monster extends Object implements Purchasable
This class describes the Monster superclass
Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Harper

  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster(String name, double maxHealth, double healAmount, double damage, double speed, int tier, int sell, int cost, String description)
      The basic constructor for the Monster class
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Monster
      maxHealth - The maxHealth of the Monster
      healAmount - The healAmount of the Monster
      damage - The amount of damage the Monster does
      speed - The speed of the Monster
      tier - The level of the Monster
      reward - The reward for killing the Monster
      sell - Selling price of the Monster
      cost - Price of the Monster
      description - Description of the Monster

    • Monster

      public Monster(int sell, int cost, String description)
      The constructor for the Monster class. This gets called when only the price in the store gets entered.
      Parameters:
      sell - Selling price of the Monster
      cost - Price of the Monster
      description - Description of the Monster

    • Monster

      public Monster()
      The constructor for the Monster class. This gets called when nothing gets entered.

      public void gainHealth(double healthChange)
      Adds or subtracts health from the Monster if statement to ensure that the current health does not exceed the max health if statement to ensure health does not go below 0
      Parameters:
      healthChange - The amount the health of the monster changes by

      victimType - The type of attack e.g grass = 2
